titles: Humors antique faces Drawne in proportion to his seuerall antique iestures.
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Imprinted [by Edward Allde] for Henry Rockett, and are to bee solde at the long Shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie,
notes: Identified as STC 17133 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
